"Given a location with a state and a country, return detailed information about it in JSON format. The output must be in English and contain only the JSON object, without any explanation or extra text.

The JSON structure should include:
- "country": Full name of the country
- "state_or_region": The state or region name provided
- "capital": Capital city of the country
- "population": Approximate population of the country
- "timezone": Main timezone(s) of the region
- "currency": Official currency name and symbol
- "language": Main spoken languages
- "region_description": A short description of the region (state)
- "climate": A brief description of the typical climate
- "fun_fact": An interesting or unique fact about the region
- "image_url": "A working image URL from Unsplash/Pexels/Official Source (no Wikimedia)"

Location:
State: %1$s
Country: %2$s

Respond only with valid JSON with no Markdown formatting."
